title: [BUG] ExecutionEngineException: Couldn't create thread. Error 0x0 in GLTextureView+GLThread.Start ()
body:
**Description**

Issue was reported by our AppCenter production crash monitoring. Not reproducible as of now.

```
System.ExecutionEngineException: Couldn't create thread. Error 0x0
```

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.80.2
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - Android: 6.0.1
- Target Devices:   <!-- the devices that you noticed this on, e.g. iPhone X -->
  - Samsung Galaxy J2 Prime
